name: js-multi-threading-demo
description: Demonstrates using of HTML5 Web Workers and Node.js worker_threads.

scripts.build: cp common/web-resources/main.css app/web-resources/ && cp common/web-resources/main.css monitor/web-resources/
scripts.start: mkdir -p logs && (node --experimental-worker monitor/server.js &> logs/monitor-output.log & node --experimental-worker app/server.js &> logs/app-output.log &)
scripts.stop: ps -efw | grep ' app/server\| monitor/server' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill

author: Antony Belov <cerberus.ab@mail.ru>
